alert.note: Alert for Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 02 at 2:32PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Twin Falls and southeastern Owyhee Counties through 315 PM MDT... At 231 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Horse Butte to near Salls Crossing to near Three Creek. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Norton Bay, Cedar Creek Reservoir, China Mountain, Crawfish Crossing, Roseworth, Salmon Falls Reservoir, Three Creek, and Salls Crossing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands
